TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComputerPrincipal extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.AuthenticablePrincipal

summary.span: 封装作为计算机帐户的主体。

span.span: Encapsulates principals that are computer accounts.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 调用 之前，必须在对象上设置 Context 属性。

span.span: The Context property must be set on the object prior to calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建时不会保存的计算机的主体帐户。The computer principal account is not persisted when it is created. 若要保存帐户，请调用方法。To persist the account, call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建时不会保存的计算机的主体帐户。The computer principal account is not persisted when it is created. 若要保存帐户，请调用方法。To save the account, call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建时不会保存的计算机的主体帐户。The computer principal account is not persisted when it is created. 若要保存帐户，请调用方法。To persist the account, call the method.

summary.span: 获取计算机帐户的服务主体名称 (SPN) 的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the Service Principal Names (SPN) for the computer account.

value.span: SPN 的集合，这些 SPN 指定为此计算机注册的帐户的名称。

span.span: A collection of SPNs that specify the names of the accounts registered for this computer.

value.span: 用于 SPN 的语法取决于基础存储区。

span.span: The syntax for the SPN depends on the underlying store.
